message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $12000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $18000 is a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my maximum budget and the value I see in this product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to consider a price of $16000 for the product. This is a compromise that still brings value to both of us.
Alice, I understand your position, but $16000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14000. This is a fair compromise that considers both our needs and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $14500. This is a reasonable price that still reflects the value of the product, but also acknowledges your budget constraints.
